text: "I'm Gonna Love Her for Both of Us" is a single by Meat Loaf released in 1981. It is from the album Dead Ringer. == Track listing == # "I'm Gonna Love Her for Both of Us" # "Everything Is Permitted" == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart !
